Text:
Thanks ever so much, dearest greenfrog!  Bobbi is possibly my all-time tippy-top favourites.  I'm sure others will appreciate her beauty as do I.

Thanks again!!!

Wow! Is it possible to get this readhead beauty?
She might be in the archives. Brie is her name :)
http://www.atklingerie.com/model.php?modelid=bri018&setid=104967&rd=100126&rid=17

Just a couple more things - first, there is some stuff in this torrent of someone with the ATK code "bob010PPP" - a (badly) shaven young woman who, IMHO, can't touch Bobbi for good looks (though if she were more natural, she might be good looking).

The other thing is that I know there is more of Bobbi in the fullbush.com archives, since some of it was posted to Usenet several years ago.  Some of it was shot in the same house where Bobbi is pictured in the kitchen, sitting on the counter with her lovely feet in the sink.

Unfortunately, the Usenet poster didn't upload full sets - only the ones that appealed to him, which never included models fully clothed, which to me are an important part of the experience.

If you don't have access to those additional sets, it's OK, of course.  I was just afraid that maybe the stuff of the other girl might have been picked up by mistake instead of other shots of the ever-delightful Bobbi.

Thanks again!

I have one more whish... One of the most underrated girls from ATK. Her name is Suzanne, age 222, from the ATK Archives. She looks like this http://bayimg.com/dAJhjaAdb
Photographed by Amadeus. Gosh what a lovely boddy.

Further to my earlier statement about there being additional images of the ever-so-lovely nineteen year old Bobbi in the fullbush.com archives, please see http://bayimg.com/lajkHAadB for one example thereof.  As I said, here we see Bobbi in the same kitchen where she appears sitting on the countertop playing with the water.  I wonder whether you might have the full set from which this ("bobbi6032.jpg") image comes.

Thanks in advance.

See also http://bayimg.com/LajKkAADb , http://bayimg.com/LAJknAadb and http://bayimg.com/LaJkOaAdb for representative images from other sets containing photos of Bobbie that have the fullbush.com credit info at the bottom.  I have only some images from each of these three sets plus the fourth set mention in my previous post.  Perhaps fullbush.com has other sets of Bobbi photos of which I am presently unaware also.

Sorry to burden you so, greenfrog, but I'm sure I'm not alone in thinking that Bobbi is surely one of the most lovely young women on the planet, and surely deserves to have her great beauty admired.  She seems so fresh and natural and innocent - very different in some ways from other girls one sees, I think.

Much obliged.

Might I request a re-upload or reseed of Marla, thegreenfrog?

I would really appreciate it, thanks.
